scripts.build: echo 'No build process needed for this extension'
scripts.server:dev: conda run -n shopping-chrome-ext uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8080 --reload --app-dir server
scripts.preserve: kill -TERM $(lsof -ti tcp:8080) 2>/dev/null || true; sleep 1; kill -KILL $(lsof -ti tcp:8080) 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.serve: bash -lc 'source ~/.zshrc >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; conda activate shopping-chrome-ext && uvicorn app.main:app --app-dir server --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8080 --reload --log-level info --access-log'
